title: Introduction to HTML and CSS
description: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to create your first web pages.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Understand the core concepts of JavaScript and start adding interactivity to your web pages.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Learn how to make your web pages look great on all devices using responsive design techniques.

title: Front-End Frameworks: React
description: Get hands-on experience with React to build dynamic and fast web applications.

title: Back-End Development with Node.js
description: Learn how to build and manage server-side applications using Node.js and Express.
